hotstarship module¶

hotstarship.get_mass(args)¶

calculates the initial mass per unit area of the TPS from input arguments

Parameters

args – input arguments

Returns

mass per unit area

Return type

type

hotstarship.handleArguments()¶

handles arguments passed to Hot-STARSHIP

Returns

args – dictionary of arguments

Return type

dict

hotstarship.hotstarship(args)¶

main function, calculates the heat transfer in thermal protection systems

Parameters

args – input arguments from handleArguments() that specify the input and output file

Returns

True for full run until specified end time, False for premature failure

Return type

type
